mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birth, user_sex, user_phone, user_email, picture_url, user_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_sex}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{picture_url}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_sex, user_birth, user_date, picture_url FROM member WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
